name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_ALL_CPU_EVENT_PECI_PSTATE
summary: Verify all CPUs in system-wide which core base_frequency excursion occurred due to P-state request from PECI in duration by command: perf sta    t -a -e pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/ sleep 60
